title: Pset_SanitaryTerminalTypeShower
description: Installation or waste water appliance that emits a spray of water to wash the human body (BS6100). HISTORY: In IFC4, Material and MaterialThickness properties removed. Use materials capabilities from IfcMaterialsResource schema. Datatype of color changed to IfcLabel (still a string value)

ShowerType.title: ShowerType
ShowerType.description:
Selection of the type of shower from the enumerated list of types where:-

Drench:  	Shower that rapidly gives a thorough soaking in an emergency.
Individual: 	Shower unit that is typically enclosed and is for the use of one person at a time.
Tunnel: 	Shower that has a succession of shower heads or spreaders that operate simultaneously along its length.

HasTray.title: HasTray
HasTray.description: Indicates whether the shower has a separate receptacle that catches the water in a shower and directs it to a waste outlet.

ShowerHeadDescription.title: ShowerHeadDescription
ShowerHeadDescription.description: A description of the shower head(s) that emit the spray of water.

DrainSize.title: DrainSize
DrainSize.description: The size of the drain outlet connection from the object.
